snippet: The no-limit Texas hold 'em tournament, which began on Sunday in Las Vegas and lasts through Tuesday, signals a return to the felt tables for the hedge fund manager David Einhorn.
abstract: The no-limit Texas hold 'em tournament, which began on Sunday in Las Vegas and lasts through Tuesday, signals a return to the felt tables for the hedge fund manager David Einhorn.

headline.main: Einhorn Stakes $1 Million on a Poker Game for Charity
